CI(Azure Pipelines): always exit 0 on command end
Summary: Proper way is probably by using azure pipelines native command, but for now a quick band-aid.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: Run azure pipelines.
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Tags: #azure_pipelines
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D734

CI(prettier): Prettier fix
Summary: Markdown syntax mistakes.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: `npm run p:c .`
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Tags: #docusaurus
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D730

CI(Azure Pipelines): Fix build failures
Summary: Build fails with the following error message:
``` /home/vsts/work/_temp/5e655b52-adf7-44d1-9dd6-176ae934b203.sh: line 2: cd: /home/vsts/work/1/docusaurus: No such file or directory [ERROR] No config file found. [INFO] Expected one of: - docusaurus.config.ts - docusaurus.config.mts - docusaurus.config.cts - docusaurus.config.js - docusaurus.config.mjs - docusaurus.config.cjs You can provide a custom config path with the `--config` option.
[ERROR] Error at findConfig (/home/vsts/work/1/s/node_modules/@docusaurus/core/lib/server/config.js:24:15) at async loadSiteConfig (/home/vsts/work/1/s/node_modules/@docusaurus/core/lib/server/config.js:31:11) at async Promise.all (index 1) at async loadContext (/home/vsts/work/1/s/node_modules/@docusaurus/core/lib/server/site.js:37:97) at async getLocalesToBuild (/home/vsts/work/1/s/node_modules/@docusaurus/core/lib/commands/build.js:79:21) at async Command.build (/home/vsts/work/1/s/node_modules/@docusaurus/core/lib/commands/build.js:59:21) [INFO] Docusaurus version: 3.5.2 Node version: v20.17.0
```
Fix this by using `npm run` command.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: Land and monitor Azure Pipelines.
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Tags: #azure_pipelines
Revert Plan: `git revert`.
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D729

meta(Licenses): Add SPDX header and more verbose copyright tags
Summary: 1. Add one missing SPDX header to fix `reuse lint`. 2. Add correct (which is Fair Use) license snippet for videolan robots.txt entry.
TODO: Do the same for DarkVisitors.com-originated entries.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: `reuse lint`.
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Tags: #docusaurus
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D727

pages(/security/): Add new page
Summary: `.well-known/security.txt` is rendered by Cloudflare, so make an explanation page with html rendering.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: `npm run dbuild`.
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Tags: #docusaurus
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D752

pages: Fix docusaurus page title
Summary: `title:` in front matter is required (ref D716) but were missing (naive thinking it was...)
Fix this by adding one. Also fixes [admonition](https://docusaurus.io/docs/markdown-features/admonitions) mistakes.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: `npm run dbuild` and visual verification.
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Tags: #docusaurus
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D753
